locations.name: Andrés's Bedroom
locations.description: Simple apartment bedroom above the tienda. Double bed shared with wife. Basic furniture - wooden dresser, small closet. Ceiling fan for Medellín's climate. Small religious picture above bed. Tile floor. Curtains on window. Modest but comfortable family bedroom.

lighting_conditions.early_morning: dark, only phone glow, wife sleeping

variations: wide shot showing bed and dresser

locations.name: Andrés's Bathroom
locations.description: Practical family bathroom in the apartment. Single sink with basic vanity and mirror. Shower (no tub). White tile walls and floor. Basic toiletries. Medicine cabinet. Clean and functional, nothing fancy.

locations.name: Andrés's Kitchen
locations.description: Small apartment kitchen with colorful Colombian tiles. Gas stove for cooking. Basic refrigerator. Open shelving with pots and dishes. Small dining table nearby or connected. Window for ventilation. Traditional Colombian cooking setup with cloth coffee strainer visible.
